overview.summary:
This module will register a set of points using a set of correspondence points. The user can choose between two methods:
1. Rigid transformations 2. Morphing using a TPS algorithom
The required fields are shown below:
InputField - This is a field of points that will be transformed
Correspondences1 - A set of points from the InputField.
Correspondences2 - The new desired location for the correspondence points.
